description.displayText: Gena is an incredible nanny!!! She is tender, patient , fun and dependable. She was just as good with my 5 year old as she was with my 2 year old. She is talented at visual arts and does an excellent job integrating learning into art activities and vice versa. She created a thematic , art-inspired, curriculum for my 2 year old that was very engaging and effective at teaching the basics. You will not be disappointed if you hire Gena!
description.originalText: Gena is an incredible nanny!!! She is tender, patient , fun and dependable. She was just as good with my 5 year old as she was with my 2 year old. She created a thematic , art-inspired, curriculum for my 2 year old that was very engaging and effective at teaching the basics. You will not be disappointed if you hire Gena!

description.displayText: Gena was our part time nanny for my son starting when he was 3 months old and will finish just after he turns 6 months. We have to move and are really sad to leave Gena. She is always punctual and incredibly dependable. It's so clear that she truly cares about my son and is always patient and positive in her interactions with him, even though he has a really hard time going down for naps and can be pretty moody. She takes him on daily walks around the neighborhood and to different parks to watch the big kids play. She's very creative and motivated: she is always singing songs, reading books, and playing on his activity mat with him. Also, she's a very hard worker and doesn't just want to sit around when my son takes naps. She helps me in ways I didn't know I needed: washing dishes/bottles, doing the laundry (including cloth diapers), sweeping, and meal prep. It's been a huge help for me as a full time working mom. Also, my husband works from home and it worked out really well; she was very conscientious of when he'd have conference calls to take my son in another room or out on a walk. Any family would be extremely lucky to have her.

description.displayText: Gena is a great nanny, she's punctual, trustworthy, and fun! She is a joy to be around,  always engaging with my girls, and always prepared.
description.originalText: Gena is a great nanny, she's punctual, trustworthy, and fun! She is a joy to be around,  always engaging with my girls, and always prepared.

description.displayText: Gena is wonderful with my 9 month old twins! They love her and she loves them which makes me very happy! She is incredibly helpful all the way around. If I need someone to take care of the babies laundry or other household chores, she's right on it. If I need a nap she takes care of the babies and I'm able to get the rest I so desperately need. Honestly, if we could afford a full-time nanny she wouldn't have a profile on here because I'd keep her all to myself. Unfortunately that is not the case but the days she works for us are very relaxing and peaceful for me. It's like a mini-vacation.

description.displayText:
Gena worked for me caring for my two little boys. She is amazing! She is extremely nurturing and Knowledgeable. She is also  trustworthy and reliable. Gena has the ability to come up with fun and educational activities for children. She showed genuine love and caring for my sons.
Gena handled my 3 month old son with ease. She took care of everything I asked of her and more. And my 3 year old son flourished with her. There isn't anything she wouldn't do for them. 
Sadly after almost 2 years of her in our lives we moved to Denver. We miss her greatly!
